title: Foreign Affairs serif
content:
I tried WhatTheFont and came up short. I love that R.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/title2_6371.gif)
author: roquestrew

comments.content: Didn't find it because it's not a font. Probably custom lettering, despite any repetition. If you like the "R", try [Grand Central](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144004/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/grand_central/?sample_text=FOREIGN%20AFFAIRS) or [Romana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144004/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=romana&sample_text=FOREIGN%20AFFAIRS).
